Question: If the number of batches made on Friday is exactly one, then which one of the following could be true?
Choices:
  A: The first batch of sugar cookies is made on Monday.
  B: The first batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Tuesday.
  C: The third batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Friday.
  D: The first batch of peanut butter cookies is made on Wednesday.
  E: The second batch of peanut butter cookies is made on Tuesday.

Thought:
The number of batches made on Friday is exactly one.
The second batch of sugar cookies is made on Thursday.
Therefore, the third batch of sugar cookies is made on Friday.
The first batch of sugar cookies cannot be made on Monday because the second batch is made on Thursday.

The first batch of sugar cookies cannot be made on Wednesday because the second batch is made on Thursday.

Therefore, the first batch of sugar cookies must be made on Friday.

Therefore, the second batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Friday.
The third batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Friday because the second batch is made on Friday.

The third batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Wednesday because the second batch is made on Friday.
The third batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Tuesday because the second batch is made on Friday.
Therefore, the third batch of oatmeal cookies must be made on Monday.

The first batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Thursday because the third batch is made on Monday.
The first batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Wednesday because the third batch is made on Monday.
Therefore, the first batch of oatmeal cookies must be made on Tuesday.
The first batch of peanut butter cookies is made on the same day as the second batch of oatmeal cookies.
Therefore, the first batch of peanut butter cookies is made on Friday.
The second batch of peanut butter cookies cannot be made on Friday because the first batch is made on Friday.
The second batch of peanut butter cookies cannot be made on Thursday because the first batch is made on Friday.
The second batch of peanut butter cookies cannot be made on Wednesday because the first batch is made on Friday.
Therefore, the second batch of peanut butter cookies must be made on Tuesday.
